medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began mild in the epigastrium and periumbilical area, then increased in severity and shifted towards the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic kidney disease, hyperaldosteronism, adrenal adenoma s/p RFA, hypertension, type 2 diabetes mellitus.
medical_history.family_history: Father: hypertension, coronary artery disease; Mother: hypertension; other family members have history of hypertension; no family history of renal disease.
